text.ascii: bRhadazva uvAca
text.ur: br̥hadaśva uvāca

text.ascii: zrutvA vacaH sudevasya RtuparNo narAdhipaH
text.ur: śrutvā vacaḥ sudevasya r̥tuparṇo narādhipaḥ

text.ascii: sAntvayaJ zlakSNayA vAcA bAhukaM pratyabhASata
text.ur: sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā bāhukaṁ pratyabhāṣata

text.ascii: vidarbhAn yAtum icchAmi damadantyAH svayaMvaram
text.ur: vidarbhān yātum icchāmi damadantyāḥ svayaṁvaram

text.ascii: ekAhnA hayatattvajJa manyase yadi bAhuka
text.ur: ekāhnā hayatattvajña manyase yadi bāhuka

text.ascii: evam uktasya kaunteya tena rAjJA nalasya ha
text.ud: एवमुक्तस्य कौन्तेय तेन राज्ञा नलस्य ह
text.ur: evam uktasya kaunteya tena rājñā nalasya ha

text.ascii: vyadIryata mano duHkhAt pradadhyau ca mahAmanAH
text.ur: vyadīryata mano duḥkhāt pradadhyau ca mahāmanāḥ

text.ascii: damayantI bhaved etat kuryAd duHkhena mohitA
text.ur: damayantī bhaved etat kuryād duḥkhena mohitā

text.ascii: asmadarthe bhaved vAyam upAyaz cintito mahAn
text.ur: asmadarthe bhaved vāyam upāyaś cintito mahān

text.ascii: nRzaMsaM bata vaidarbhI kartukAmA tapasvinI
text.ur: nr̥śaṁsaṁ bata vaidarbhī kartukāmā tapasvinī

text.ascii: mayA kSudreNa nikRtA pApenAkRtabuddhinA
text.ur: mayā kṣudreṇa nikr̥tā pāpenākr̥tabuddhinā

text.ascii: strIsvabhAvaz calo loke mama doSaz ca dAruNaH
text.ur: strīsvabhāvaś calo loke mama doṣaś ca dāruṇaḥ

text.ascii: syAd evam api kuryAt sA vivazA gatasauhRdA
text.ur: syād evam api kuryāt sā vivaśā gatasauhr̥dā

text.ascii: mama zokena saMvignA nairAzyAt tanumadhyamA
text.ur: mama śokena saṁvignā nairāśyāt tanumadhyamā

text.ascii: na caivaM karhi cit kuryAt sApatyA ca vizeSataH
text.ur: na caivaṁ karhi cit kuryāt sāpatyā ca viśeṣataḥ

text.ascii: yad atra tathyaM pathyaM ca gatvA vetsyAmi nizcayam
text.ud: यदत्र तथ्यं पथ्यं च गत्वा वेत्स्यामि निश्चयम्
text.ur: yad atra tathyaṁ pathyaṁ ca gatvā vetsyāmi niścayam

text.ascii: RtuparNasya vai kAmam AtmArthaM ca karomy aham
text.ur: r̥tuparṇasya vai kāmam ātmārthaṁ ca karomy aham

text.ascii: iti nizcitya manasA bAhuko dInamAnasaH
text.ur: iti niścitya manasā bāhuko dīnamānasaḥ

text.ascii: kRtAJjalir uvAcedam RtuparNaM narAdhipam
text.ur: kr̥tāñjalir uvācedam r̥tuparṇaṁ narādhipam

text.ascii: pratijAnAmi te satyaM gamiSyasi narAdhipa
text.ur: pratijānāmi te satyaṁ gamiṣyasi narādhipa

text.ascii: ekAhnA puruSavyAghra vidarbhanagarIM nRpa
text.ur: ekāhnā puruṣavyāghra vidarbhanagarīṁ nr̥pa

text.ascii: tataH parIkSAm azvAnAM cakre rAjan sa bAhukaH
text.ur: tataḥ parīkṣām aśvānāṁ cakre rājan sa bāhukaḥ

text.ascii: azvazAlAm upAgamya bhAGgasvarinRpAjJayA
text.ur: aśvaśālām upāgamya bhāṅgasvarinr̥pājñayā

text.ascii: sa tvaryamANo bahuza RtuparNena bAhukaH
text.ur: sa tvaryamāṇo bahuśa r̥tuparṇena bāhukaḥ

text.ascii: adhyagacchat kRzAn azvAn samarthAn adhvani kSamAn
text.ur: adhyagacchat kr̥śān aśvān samarthān adhvani kṣamān

text.ascii: tejobalasamAyuktAn kulazIlasamanvitAn
text.ur: tejobalasamāyuktān kulaśīlasamanvitān

text.ascii: varjitA&l lakSaNair hInaiH pRthuprothAn mahAhanUn
text.ur: varjitām̐l lakṣaṇair hīnaiḥ pr̥thuprothān mahāhanūn

text.ascii: zuddhAn dazabhir AvartaiH sindhujAn vAtaraMhasaH
text.ur: śuddhān daśabhir āvartaiḥ sindhujān vātaraṁhasaḥ

text.ascii: dRSTvA tAn abravId rAjA kiM cit kopasamanvitaH
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭvā tān abravīd rājā kiṁ cit kopasamanvitaḥ

text.ascii: kim idaM prArthitaM kartuM pralabdhavyA hi te vayam
text.ud: किमिदं प्रार्थितं कर्तुं प्रलब्धव्या हि ते वयम्
text.ur: kim idaṁ prārthitaṁ kartuṁ pralabdhavyā hi te vayam

text.ascii: katham alpabalaprANA vakSyantIme hayA mama
text.ur: katham alpabalaprāṇā vakṣyantīme hayā mama

text.ascii: mahAn adhvA ca turagair gantavyaH katham IdRzaiH
text.ur: mahān adhvā ca turagair gantavyaḥ katham īdr̥śaiḥ

text.ascii: bAhuka uvAca
text.ur: bāhuka uvāca

text.ascii: ete hayA gamiSyanti vidarbhAn nAtra saMzayaH
text.ur: ete hayā gamiṣyanti vidarbhān nātra saṁśayaḥ

text.ascii: athAnyAn manyase rAjan brUhi kAn yojayAmi te
text.ur: athānyān manyase rājan brūhi kān yojayāmi te

text.ascii: RtuparNa uvAca
text.ur: r̥tuparṇa uvāca

text.ascii: tvam eva hayatattvajJaH kuzalaz cAsi bAhuka
text.ur: tvam eva hayatattvajñaḥ kuśalaś cāsi bāhuka

text.ascii: yAn manyase samarthAMs tvaM kSipraM tAn eva yojaya
text.ur: yān manyase samarthāṁs tvaṁ kṣipraṁ tān eva yojaya

text.ascii: bRhadazva uvAca
text.ur: br̥hadaśva uvāca

text.ascii: tataH sadazvAMz caturaH kulazIlasamanvitAn
text.ur: tataḥ sadaśvāṁś caturaḥ kulaśīlasamanvitān

text.ascii: yojayAm Asa kuzalo javayuktAn rathe naraH
text.ur: yojayām āsa kuśalo javayuktān rathe naraḥ

text.ascii: tato yuktaM rathaM rAjA samArohat tvarAnvitaH
text.ur: tato yuktaṁ rathaṁ rājā samārohat tvarānvitaḥ

text.ascii: atha paryapatan bhUmau jAnubhis te hayottamAH
text.ur: atha paryapatan bhūmau jānubhis te hayottamāḥ

text.ascii: tato naravaraH zrImAn nalo rAjA vizAM pate
text.ud: ततो नरवरः श्रीमान्नलो राजा विशां पते
text.ur: tato naravaraḥ śrīmān nalo rājā viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: sAntvayAm Asa tAn azvAMs tejobalasamanvitAn
text.ur: sāntvayām āsa tān aśvāṁs tejobalasamanvitān

text.ascii: razmibhiz ca samudyamya nalo yAtum iyeSa saH
text.ur: raśmibhiś ca samudyamya nalo yātum iyeṣa saḥ

text.ascii: sUtam Aropya vArSNeyaM javam AsthAya vai param
text.ur: sūtam āropya vārṣṇeyaṁ javam āsthāya vai param

text.ascii: te codyamAnA vidhinA bAhukena hayottamAH
text.ur: te codyamānā vidhinā bāhukena hayottamāḥ

text.ascii: samutpetur ivAkAzaM rathinaM mohayann iva
text.ur: samutpetur ivākāśaṁ rathinaṁ mohayann iva

text.ascii: tathA tu dRSTvA tAn azvAn vahato vAtaraMhasaH
text.ur: tathā tu dr̥ṣṭvā tān aśvān vahato vātaraṁhasaḥ

text.ascii: ayodhyAdhipatir dhImAn vismayaM paramaM yayau
text.ur: ayodhyādhipatir dhīmān vismayaṁ paramaṁ yayau

text.ascii: rathaghoSaM tu taM zrutvA hayasaMgrahaNaM ca tat
text.ud: रथघोषं तु तं श्रुत्वा हयसंग्रहणं च तत्
text.ur: rathaghoṣaṁ tu taṁ śrutvā hayasaṁgrahaṇaṁ ca tat

text.ascii: vArSNeyaz cintayAm Asa bAhukasya hayajJatAm
text.ur: vārṣṇeyaś cintayām āsa bāhukasya hayajñatām

text.ascii: kiM nu syAn mAtalir ayaM devarAjasya sArathiH
text.ur: kiṁ nu syān mātalir ayaṁ devarājasya sārathiḥ

text.ascii: tathA hi lakSaNaM vIre bAhuke dRzyate mahat
text.ud: तथा हि लक्षणं वीरे बाहुके दृश्यते महत्
text.ur: tathā hi lakṣaṇaṁ vīre bāhuke dr̥śyate mahat

text.ascii: zAlihotro 'tha kiM nu syAd dhayAnAM kulatattvavit
text.ur: śālihotro ’tha kiṁ nu syād dhayānāṁ kulatattvavit

text.ascii: mAnuSaM samanuprApto vapuH paramazobhanam
text.ur: mānuṣaṁ samanuprāpto vapuḥ paramaśobhanam

text.ascii: utAhosvid bhaved rAjA nalaH parapuraMjayaH
text.ur: utāhosvid bhaved rājā nalaḥ parapuraṁjayaḥ

text.ascii: so 'yaM nRpatir AyAta ity evaM samacintayat
text.ur: so ’yaṁ nr̥patir āyāta ity evaṁ samacintayat

text.ascii: atha vA yAM nalo veda vidyAM tAm eva bAhukaH
text.ud: अथ वा यां नलो वेद विद्यां तामेव बाहुकः
text.ur: atha vā yāṁ nalo veda vidyāṁ tām eva bāhukaḥ

text.ascii: tulyaM hi lakSaye jJAnaM bAhukasya nalasya ca
text.ud: तुल्यं हि लक्षये ज्ञानं बाहुकस्य नलस्य च
text.ur: tulyaṁ hi lakṣaye jñānaṁ bāhukasya nalasya ca

text.ascii: api cedaM vayas tulyam asya manye nalasya ca
text.ud: अपि चेदं वयस्तुल्यमस्य मन्ये नलस्य च
text.ur: api cedaṁ vayas tulyam asya manye nalasya ca

text.ascii: nAyaM nalo mahAvIryas tadvidyas tu bhaviSyati
text.ur: nāyaṁ nalo mahāvīryas tadvidyas tu bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: pracchannA hi mahAtmAnaz caranti pRthivIm imAm
text.ur: pracchannā hi mahātmānaś caranti pr̥thivīm imām

text.ascii: daivena vidhinA yuktAH zAstroktaiz ca virUpaNaiH
text.ur: daivena vidhinā yuktāḥ śāstroktaiś ca virūpaṇaiḥ

text.ascii: bhavet tu matibhedo me gAtravairUpyatAM prati
text.ur: bhavet tu matibhedo me gātravairūpyatāṁ prati

text.ascii: pramANAt parihInas tu bhaved iti hi me matiH
text.ur: pramāṇāt parihīnas tu bhaved iti hi me matiḥ

text.ascii: vayaHpramANaM tattulyaM rUpeNa tu viparyayaH
text.ur: vayaḥpramāṇaṁ tattulyaṁ rūpeṇa tu viparyayaḥ

text.ascii: nalaM sarvaguNair yuktaM manye bAhukam antataH
text.ur: nalaṁ sarvaguṇair yuktaṁ manye bāhukam antataḥ

text.ascii: evaM vicArya bahuzo vArSNeyaH paryacintayat
text.ur: evaṁ vicārya bahuśo vārṣṇeyaḥ paryacintayat

text.ascii: hRdayena mahArAja puNyazlokasya sArathiH
text.ur: hr̥dayena mahārāja puṇyaślokasya sārathiḥ

text.ascii: RtuparNas tu rAjendra bAhukasya hayajJatAm
text.ur: r̥tuparṇas tu rājendra bāhukasya hayajñatām

text.ascii: cintayan mumude rAjA sahavArSNeyasArathiH
text.ur: cintayan mumude rājā sahavārṣṇeyasārathiḥ

text.ascii: balaM vIryaM tathotsAhaM hayasaMgrahaNaM ca tat
text.ud: बलं वीर्यं तथोत्साहं हयसंग्रहणं च तत्
text.ur: balaṁ vīryaṁ tathotsāhaṁ hayasaṁgrahaṇaṁ ca tat

text.ascii: paraM yatnaM ca saMprekSya parAM mudam avApa ha
text.ud: परं यत्नं च संप्रेक्ष्य परां मुदमवाप ह
text.ur: paraṁ yatnaṁ ca saṁprekṣya parāṁ mudam avāpa ha
